Customize CSS v{{glyphPicker.version}}

CSS glyph classes generator

Use the following format to generate CSS of the resulting classes. "Name" will be replaced with glyph name. "unicode" will be replaced with glyph unicode.
Symbol:
Index:
Unicode:
ID:
Name:
Class:
Class (right):
Description:
